TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataListDesigner extends System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner

summary.span: 擴充 Web 伺服器控制項的設計階段行為。

span.span: Extends design-time behavior for the Web server control.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何擴充類別。The following code example demonstrates how to extend the class. 程式碼會覆寫方法，以顯示五個點的框線也就是紫色如果啟用控制項。The code overrides the method to display a five-point border that is purple if the control is enabled. remarks.format: ## Remarks 而不是使用編輯畫面格，使用範本群組和設計工具編輯區域。Rather than using editing frames, use template groups and designer editing regions. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 與 。For more information, see and .

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)

param.name: disposing
param.span: ，表示釋放 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源，，則表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

span.span: to release both the managed and unmanaged resources; to release only the unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 釋放 物件所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性釋放 Managed 資源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the object and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當`disposing`是`true`，則方法的 managed 物件所持有的資源全部釋出這個物件參考。When `disposing` is `true`, the method releases all resources held by the managed objects that this object references.

span.para: 方法可以由其他物件呼叫多次。當覆寫它，請確定不會參考已在先前呼叫中處置的物件。如需有關如何實作，請參閱 <<c2> [ 實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。如需詳細資訊及方法，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源總](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)並[覆寫 Finalize 方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。

The method can be called multiple times by other objects. When overriding it, ensure that you do not reference objects that have been disposed in an earlier call to . For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). For more information about the and methods, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string GetDesignTimeHtml() cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetDesignTimeHtml () As String

summary.span: 取得 HTML，用於在設計階段表示 控制項。

span.span: Gets the HTML used to represent the control at design time.

returns.span: HTML，用於在設計階段表示 控制項。

span.span: The HTML that is used to represent the control at design time.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫方法。The following code example shows how to override the method. 它改變了設計介面則控制項的外觀的控制項屬性是`true`。It alters the appearance of the control on the design surface if the control's property is `true`. 此程式碼使用`Try...Catch...Finally`語法來執行下列動作：The code uses `Try...Catch...Finally` syntax to do the following: - `Try`區段會變更控制項的屬性值。The `Try` section changes the values of the properties of the control. - `Catch`一節會攔截任何例外狀況，並將它們以傳送方法。The `Catch` section catches any exceptions and sends them to the method. - `Finally`區段將屬性設為其原始值。The `Finally` section sets the properties to their original values. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[DataGridDesigner_Sample2#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataGridDesigner_Sample2/CS/SimpleGridView.cs#2)] [!code-vb[DataGridDesigner_Sample2#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataGridDesigner_Sample2/VB/SimpleGridView.vb#2)]

span.span: The HTML used to represent an empty template-based control at design time.

span.span: The HTML displayed at design time for the specified exception.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫方法來修改外觀時發生例外狀況在設計介面上的控制項。The following code example shows how to override the method to modify the appearance of the control on the design surface when an exception occurs. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. summary.span: 當基礎控制項所繫結的資料來源載入新結構描述 (Schema) 時被呼叫。

span.span: Called when the data source to which the underlying control is bound loads a new schema.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 覆寫方法，以執行新的結構描述可供使用時可能需要的其他動作。Override the method to perform additional actions that might be required when new schema becomes available.
